articles.author: Ivana Kottasová
articles.title: European officials cry sabotage after two internet cables are cut in the Baltic Sea - CNN
articles.description: European officials are looking toward Russia after two submarine internet cables in the Baltic Sea were suddenly disrupted in an apparent sabotage operation, just weeks after the United States warned that Moscow was likely to target critical undersea infrastr…
articles.content: European officials are looking toward Russia after two submarine internet cables in the Baltic Sea were suddenly disrupted in an apparent sabotage operation, just weeks after the United States warned… [+8650 chars]
